summary: Rebrand the web UI as ‚ÄúGoa Car Rental‚Äù with tagline ‚ÄúBest Bike & Car Rental in Goa + Free Travel Planner‚Äù, keep Mock/Simulation Mode available but DISABLED by default (no warning banner), and refactor ‚ÄúPlan My Trip‚Äù to use permanent Advanced Local Logic (smart mock data) fully inside the frontend (JavaScript) with NO backend/canister calls so it never crashes; ensure duration slicing works correctly (1 Day vs 3/5 Days), budget-specific hotel/food recommendations render from local Low/Medium/High datasets, and keep the WhatsApp CTA in the ‚ÄúRecommended Transport‚Äù card pointing to the real number (constructed via string concatenation) with prefilled text ‚ÄúI want to rent a car in Goa‚Äù.

Update the WhatsApp CTA so the ‚ÄúBook Now on WhatsApp‚Äù button links to the dummy number 919999999999 (URL must be exactly `https://wa.me/919999999999`).
